philosophy.short: Clarity over precision. If it’s unclear, don’t argue.
philosophy.long: Simple, intent-based Line of Sight. Precision geometry is not required; clarity and momentum matter more.
philosophy.fast_resolution: If players cannot quickly agree: the shot does not happen OR the target gains Cover. Choose the option that keeps the game moving.

line_of_sight.short: If there’s doubt, LoS is blocked.
line_of_sight.long: A clear, believable line between attacker and target. If there is doubt, Line of Sight is blocked.
line_of_sight.definition: A clear, believable line between attacker and target.

blockers.elevation_rule: Elevation does not override solid blockers. Being higher does not allow models to see over walls or cliffs.

cover_mechanics.short: Cover gives +1 Defense vs ranged attacks.
cover_mechanics.long: Cover represents partial obstruction that makes a model harder to hit. It is not total protection.
cover_mechanics.definition: Partial obstruction providing a defensive bonus.
negation_triggers: Attacker is within the same terrain piece as the target.
Model is Exposed by an ability or effect.

terrain_trait_interactions.result: Cover may be lost if terrain collapses

design_intent.text: Line of Sight should be obvious, Cover should be simple, and disputes should be rare and brief. The Canyon is dangerous enough without arguments.
